TopicTitle: Returning to the VAB(or space plane hangar) and relaunching without reverting

Articles.Content:
Hi!

As the title say, I think it would be cool to be able to return to the VAB/SPH without having to reverting the time back the to last moment you were there.

Currently, the only way to do that is to go to the KSC and then go the launch pad/runway or the VAB/SPH. Why difference would that make? Not a lot(of course), but for those who want to keep the victims dead(e.g for role-play), it can be annoying to go to the KSC each time.

I know that it doesn't make a big difference but it could be a feature for future updates.
